name: FactorySearch
title: Factory Search
author: Xorimuth
description:
Search your factory for items, fluids, entities, signals, and more, with Control + Shift + F. Returns a list of buildings, clicking on a result opens it in the map. Supports Space Exploration (works across all surfaces).
Control + Shift + Click on almost anything (e.g. built entity, inventory item, recipe) to open the search with that item selected.
Similar to BeastFinder and Where is it Made?
